, the home of Indiana Wesleyan University, and birthplace of James Dean.
Matter Park Christmas Light display during the Holiday season.
James Dean Festival every summer. Every other year the YMCA puts on an Easter pageant!

Baldwin Cafeteria of Indiana Wesleyan University has a great Sunday breakfast after church time.
Southside Diner breakfast challenge called the Eliminator. So much food-eggs, sausage, bacon, potatoes, biscuits and gravy, pancakes $19.99 if eaten in one hour it is free!
College Inn Bed and Breakfast. S. Washington St. Directly across from Indiana Wesleyan University. Quiet, quant place with friendly staff!
